help.open: Each player has 4 pieces. Blue opens.
help.turn: Each turn, place a piece or move one to a neighbor:
help.win: Form a line of 4 or a small square to win:
help.credits: Derived from Teeko by John Scarne.

status.aDropMove: Blue moves or places piece {{piece}} out of 4…
status.bDropMove: Red moves or places piece {{piece}} out of 4…
